medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: RLQ pain began about 28 hours ago, escalating over a few hours and remaining localized in the RLQ. Several hours later, patient developed nausea and subsequently vomited twice. Patient reported a sensation of warmth but did not check temperature. There were no episodes of constipation or diarrhea. This was the first instance of experiencing such pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Testicular mass, removal of testicular mass.
